content:
ICS 45C Fall 2019 | News | Course Reference | Schedule | Project Guide | Notes and Examples | Grade Calculator | About Alex

ICS 45C Fall 2019
Course News

Check back here every day or so. I will generally post important coursewide announcements here. They will be listed in reverse-chronological order (i.e., newest items first).

Date Added News Item
Th 10/10 More new Notes and Examples are now available, along with a Schedule update.
Tu 10/8 A few adjustments have been made to the schedule of tutors in the Course Reference, including the addition of some hours on Fridays (and the removal of a couple of Mondays).
Su 10/6 Several new sets of Notes and Examples are available, along with a Schedule update, and Project #1.
M 9/30 TA, reader, and tutor information is now listed in the Course Reference, as well as a preliminary schedule of lab meetings, which will begin on Wednesday, October 2. I do expect some additional hours (featuring the course TAs) will be added soon, as well.
Th 9/26 My office hours will be on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 8:30-9:45pm in DBH 1420, beginning on Tuesday, October 1.
Th 9/19

Welcome! Please note a couple of things as we get started this quarter:

  • The first lecture will meet on Thursday, September 26. There are no scheduled lab sections, but we will have informal lab meetings, which I expect will begin next week, with times and days to be announced. For more information about meeting times of lab meetings, see the Course Reference. For information about lecture material and readings, see the Schedule.
  • I encourage you to spend some time reading through the material on the course web site. It will be updated periodically throughout the quarter, and there will always be an announcement here describing each update. For now, notice the set of links at the top of this (and every) page, leading you to the Course Reference, the Schedule, and the Project Guide, as well as a set of Notes and Examples — mostly emanating from the lectures — that will be posted throughout the quarter.
